title: Topic 003 Question 046
body: You have an Azure IoT solution that contains an Azure IoT Edge device named Edge1.
You connect to Edge1 and identify the following:
•	The IoT Edge agent is running.
•	The IoT Edge agent continually reports the following error: “Empty dconfig file.”
You need to ensure that Edge1 starts successfully.
options: Update the /etc/hosts file for the host operating system and restart Edge1.
Reapply the iotedge config and restart Edge1.
Specify a DNS server for the container engine and restart Edge1.
